meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound consisting of a benzene ring with one or more ethyl groups attached.
meanings.sent1: The ethylbenzenes used in the experiment had a strong smell.
meanings.sent2: Chemists study ethylbenzenes to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The ethylbenzenes at the party were the life of the chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like ethylbenzenes - complex yet fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The ethylbenzenes shimmered under the laboratory lights, captivating everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The storage room was filled with barrels of ethylbenzenes.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers produce ethylbenzenes in large quantities.
meanings.sent3: The ethylbenzenes on the shelves seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The ethylbenzenes lined up like soldiers ready for chemical warfare.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of ethylbenzenes filled the air, creating a pleasant atmosphere in the lab.
